content: up for the petals *chain 3 tc3tcluster chain 3 slip_stitch to the back of first chain chain 3 slip_stitch flo to the base stitch of round 3 slip_stitch flo to the next stitches x2* repeat from * until the end of round 3 to move to round 2 please treat first single_crochet and chain note a step-by-step photo tutorial for a from round 3 as a bridge repeat from * in single petal is on page 5 back loop only of round 2 total 16 petals 3 water lily granny square graph 3- granny square written pattern this part is worked behind the petals so round 4 starts in third loops only photo info added on the last page attach the new yarn to the third loop only of any of the stitches of round 3 round 4 green single_crochet tlo chain as first double_crochet double_crochet tlo in the same stitch double_crochet tlo 1 increase double_crochet tlo x 9 double_crochet tlo 1 slip_stitch blo total 30 round 5 green single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet 2 increase x 9 double_crochet 2 slip_stitch blo total 40 round 6 green single_crochet chain as first double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 3 tc chain 3 double_crochet 2 x 3 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 3 tc chain 3 double_crochet slip_stitch blo total 40 chains not included round 7 green single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet 6 double_crochet 3 in the chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 3 in the chain space double_crochet 9 double_crochet 3 in the chain space chain 2 x 3 fptc ch2 double_crochet 3 in the chain space double_crochet 2 ij total 64 chains not included congratulations and thank you thank you for trying out this pattern if you have any troubles or suggestions of how i can improve it don t hesitate to dm me 4 blo/tlo wrong side right side tlo - third blo - back loop only loop only flo - front loop only invisible join 1 cut the yarn and pull the loop to make one string pull the cut yarn through the loop and insert the hook in the first loop of this round 2 pull the yarn to the other side 3 insert the hook into the last chain back loop only and pull the yarn to the other side weave in the rest of the yarn 4 overview from the top petals step-by-step instruction 1 chain 3 2 tc3cluster 3 chain 3 slip_stitch 4 overview after sl to the st marked loop 5 chain 3 6 slip_stitch to the base 5
